channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Coach Byrne?s controversial new tactics throw the team into disarray, rousing Bobby's suspicions. Is he really trying to improve them, or is there something more sinister going on.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: Steve is going large as he focuses on the biggest animals to have ever walked the earth. In his dino den, he starts by meeting the Argentinosaurus - an animal so large that even its poo was deadly! But if you thought that was the biggest ever dinosaur, then think again. With stunning graphics and epic stunts, featuring a piano smash, a fire hose hose-down and the most powerful heart in the animal kingdom, Steve crowns his king of all beasts.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Rio has lost his air guitar and his confidence. The band travel through space to take him home to Planet Rock to see the Godfather of Rock, who will help him get them back.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Adam and Joe become busy bees for a gunge-fuelled challenge ? who will collect the most nectar and win Callum?s ultimate respect.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: Paani seeks refuge in a grouse's burrow during a snowstorm but then gets trapped.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Big Lizard isn't happy in his skin! Cosima tries everything to stop him scratching until she realises that's exactly what he needs to do. He's shedding his skin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Penfold takes a trip inside Danger Mouse's body to save him from a deadly aversion to his own heroism.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: It's the famous Beanotown Freewheeler Derby! During practice, the gang realize Walter's go-kart is especially speedy. Worried that Walter will beat his record, Dennis creates a lighter, faster kart but loses control and injures himself. It is up to Rubi's wheelchair know-how and Dennis' super-speedy karting skills to win the race.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The Gnome Crystal Mine has ground to a halt, leaving the forest with no crystals, no power supply and melting ice lollies! The heroes are tasked with a quest to find out what has happened and to fix it. It turns out that a slimy beast named Smarg has made the mine her home. But with Hoofius?s fear of gunk getting the better of him, evicting the slippery Smarg is not going to be easy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: My Life
channel.desc: The world is not always built for kids like 13-year-old Eleanor - who has a visual impairment - but she wants to change that. Follow her trailblazing challenge to audio describe a live show at the National Theatre ? usually done by sighted people. While juggling her own journey to gain independence, Eleanor must prove to herself and her parents that she is ready to take her next big steps.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: A visit to the Wild Area turns into a curry-making adventure for the Rising Volt Tacklers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: Proteus, leader of the mysterious Guardians, traps the Aronnax in a magnetic field and kidnaps Ant, believing he is the key to finding Lemuria. Ant thinks Proteus is crazy. He tries to escape to save his family.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis is mega-excited to trial a pair of hi-tech Smarty Pants - underpants with all the capabilities of a smartphone. However, whenever he and the gang test the pants, Walter is always one step ahead of them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. When the Baron rearranges the countries of the world, Danger Mouse reluctantly joins forces with his American counterpart Jeopardy Mouse and takes New Zealand for a spin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: While fulfilling customer orders, the Ninjas realise that a spy has been following them to help a copycat Ninja delivery service steal their business.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Animation about the adventures of Shaun the Sheep. Shaun's attempts to get his hands on some apples from a tree overhanging the naughty pigs' yard cause trouble.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: After touching a mysterious tooth, a lemming turns into a were-lemming.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: The kids start upcycling broken items for people in town. However, things go wrong when Cheese focuses on making things look cool rather than fixing them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When the heroes are faced with the Goblin King moving into the Big Birch, they decide to invent a quest that will soon have him running back home.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. Agents compete against rival Odd Squad agents to solve an odd problem.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. Otis and Olympia investigate why people in town are stuck in slow motion.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: Chef tries to trick the kids into making his mother gifts after he forgets Mother's Day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face an elusive villain.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: After 100 years, the secrets of Laqua finally come to light.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: It?s time for Samba de Amigo! Two teams, guided by pro gamer Jelly, dance their way to victory. Which team will make it through.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: As Adele says goodbye to The Next Step, she tries to mend fences with Olive. Things get complicated between Heath and Pascale as Anthony deals with Adele leaving.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: Steve Backshall meets a shark that is a master of teamwork - the blacktip shark. The blacktip isn't the largest shark in its territory, so it adopts a sensible solution to survive.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Can Bitzer and Shaun ensure that the regular dance competition is run fairly.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: The Snowman is hired as Danger Mouse's new sidekick, leaving Penfold without a job.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: A bungled attempt at a stunt leads to Dennis accidentally becoming an internet star and Beanotown celebrity! But his moment of fame is short and Dennis is soon replaced by Walter's cat, who can play the piano. Dennis has to stage the best stunt yet to gain back his audience.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Girl enters a cosplay costume contest to win a trophy and meet her favourite TV star, but needs somebody to wear the back end of her enormous costume. Boy is horrified at dressing as the character?s bum, but he doesn't want to let his sister down. Can he put aside his embarrassment to help Girl win the competition.

channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy discovers a special lamp that can compact organic elements.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The extraordinary animals from a tablet game come to life after the device explodes.

channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Omar catches a case of Clown-i-tosis.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Buckle up for a turbocharged, F1-style road race with Bitzer! Who will make it to pole position.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: The gang find Helsing's monster phone book and prank call Frank, the world?s scariest monster. The gang must prepare the house when a furious Frank seeks his revenge.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: Top Minecraft and Mario Kart tips to help you turn your grandparent into a gaming legend. Plus Jelly, Yammy and Slogo face off in the ultimate Minecraft build showdown! Who will be crowned the Pro Gamer Champion.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: As the regionals qualifier clashes with the Brawl?s, A-Troupe struggle under the weight of all the secrets they have kept from each other.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon: Sun and Moon
channel.desc: Danger looms in Fula City, and Ash, Pikachu and their new friends fight to save the day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pickle Storm
channel.desc: The Hairy Egg is ready to hatch and Pickle is keeping it safe. There is widespread panic when it disappears and Pickle's parents forget who they are. Time is running out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Alicia and Darrell are trapped in the cellar after Alicia receives some bad news. Can finding the time capsule help them? Meanwhile, Irene feels pressured by her musical ambitions.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: As the players embrace their new positions, Christina helps Andrew train to be a striker. However, an anonymous message leaves her facing an impossible decision.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: The Jurassic was home to the most vicious and violent predators the world has ever seen. To survive, herbivores had to fight back. Steve Backshall goes on a mission to track down the deadliest of all dinosaur defenders. He meets the armoured tank that is Nodosaurus, tests whether an Iguanodon really has what it takes to beat a T rex and thanks to some mega-engineering, unleashes an Ankylosaurus tail-swinging robot that goes on the rampage and then some.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Whiff says he needs help so Mac invents Robo Whiff ? a super efficient robot roadie. Things soon start to go wrong, however, as Whiff?s pushy robotic twin starts to take over the band.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Callum inflicts terror and temptation on Adam and Joe to see who can impress him the most and be the 'last to leave the circle'.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: When a herd of elephants is trapped in a cave, the Octonauts have to get them out quickly.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Dad gets a severe case of Proximan hiccups. Big Lizard and Cosima do their best to help, but their attempt to scare Dad goes wrong when a real 'monster' turns up.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: The danger agents are at Squawk's super-secret Wild West testing facility, home to a society of Penbots, robots who have a rather familiar face. Squawk is sure she has improved upon Penfold and made the perfect robotic sidekick for Danger Mouse, Tenfold. But Tenfold malfunctions and transforms into the ruthless Meanfold, determined to destroy anyone who is not quite perfect.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: There's a werewolf-type creature on the prowl and suspicion falls on Gnasher. Dennis has to prove his best pal's innocence as the full moon shines down on Beanotown..

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Mr Friendlyface is acting very strangely indeed. He refuses to stamp any of Admin Bunny?s documents, keeps getting distracted by butterflies, and seems oddly happy! The heroes are extremely suspicious and decide that someone must have swapped him with a doppelganger. Now they must quest to find out where the real Friendlyface is and get him back before the forest descends into total chaos.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: My Life
channel.desc: BSL campaigner Daniel Jillings is on a mission to get the whole world signing.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: When Roy?s Ancient Pok? Ball is stolen, the Rising Volt Tacklers track down the thief.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: Devil Daniels, Monster Hunter thinks he's hunting a siren - a mythical creature whose song lures sailors to their doom. The Nektons discover it's actually a rare whale with a unique voice and race to save it from destruction.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: There?s a new tripe hound in Beanotown, and Gnasher falls head over paws in love with her. Bertie is looking after the visiting dog, Ginger, and is determined to keep her away from riff-raff like Gnasher.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When an old enemy returns, Colonel K must come out of retirement to save the world from an outbreak of rudeness.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: Desperate for peace and quiet, an alien leader orders an entertainer to take care of his planet's creatures. However, things nearly go wrong when Konpeki brings a giant cake.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation set on a remote rural farm. Shaun's flock lives a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog Bitzer. The farmer takes up oil painting and is determined to paint a masterpiece. However, when his back is turned, Shaun and the flock decide to have a go.

channel.desc: Grizzy uses a hen to protect some Yummy jars from the Lemmings.
